Posts.Content: Hoolianama0508 wrote: I just bought these tops for $6.00 and they provide excellent coverage. The neck and underarm area are high cut, so there is no gaping anywhere. I have been so self conscious about finding the best tops that flatter and cover up. I matter, I count, I am important. Posts.Title: Target Merona Ruffle Shirred Tank Tops Hoolianama0508 Djustme

Posts.Content: Hoolianama0508 wrote: Not sure if this is the best category to place this thread however I am in my last week of radiation and need help with this. I finished chemotherapy in October 2009 and got my menstural cycle back almost immediately (darn it!) When it returned, I noticed that is was very dark and just assumed it was because my body was readjusting to life without chemo. Recently I have noticed that I am getting the cycle almost twice a month. Is this a sign of early menopause? Or is this just the body taking it's time to regulate itself? I matter, I count, I am important. I am living strong Dx 3/27/2009, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/13 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Am I experiencing early menopause? Hoolianama0508 precioustime
